description:
1.1.0 Updates
Not fullscreen anymore. The app wasn't working well because of that. This will be the last version of the app.
1.0.7 Updates
- fixed a bug
- added more thunder

1.0.6 Updates
- fullscreen video
- now you can play while listening to music

1.0.5 Updates:
- the slider is in the menu now

1.0.4 Updates:
- updated slider transparency

1.0.3 Updates:
- added more thunder 

1.0.2 Updates:
- timer

1.0.1 Updates: 
- fullscreen 
- improved audio & video looping

This app is for all of you rain lovers. It features a stereo audio rain loop and a very green video loop. The audio contains rain, birds and thunder sounds. Tip: use the app while listening to music. Credits for the sound loop go to http://www.rainymood.com/ and for the video to 
http://www.youtube.com/user/johnboy1uk. Enjoy and don't forget there's a donate button in the menu ;)
